Summary: Two separate objects from different directions toward each other that was shaped oblong and changed directions abruptly with lights flashing.The larger one changed directions very quickly and went from West to East then circled over my house. t
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Savannah
There were no other sightings in Savannah on or around October 6th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my front porch and noticed what I was sure was a plane until the first larger object changed directions very fast. I thought a plane or helicopter can not change directions that quick, so I proceeded to watch and then a smaller object appeared coming toward the larger one and they met and kept going. The larger one was gray and shaped like a submarine. It would stop in mid air for a second then move forward and change again. It turned and flew slowly over my house then back to circling around they area. I watched it until it disappeared in mid air.
